title: MacOS Style Dock
subtitle: Hover over the dock icons to see the magnification effect
description: Click on any dock icon to mark it as active. The magnification effect applies to neighboring icons based on proximity.

settings.title: Settings
settings.autoHideDesc: Automatically hide Dock when mouse is away
settings.triggerDistanceDesc: Show Dock when mouse is within this distance from bottom
settings.maxVisibleIconsDesc: Enable horizontal scroll when exceeding this number
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset to default settings?

drawer.title: Menu
drawer.content1: Access frequently used tools and shortcuts from here.
drawer.content2: View your recently accessed files and documents.
drawer.content3: Get help and learn more about available features.
